title: dhyAnam onrE pOdum
sahitya:
dhyAnam onrE pOdum nalla teLLarivOngiDa uLLa poruL viLangiDa


anupallavi

  mOnak-kaDalinilE muttuk-kuLippadu pOl mUzhgip-parama sukha vAzhvu peTruyarndiDa


caraNam    vindai vindai mathangaL tam tam perumai pEshi viLaikkum carccaravilE saLaittEn poruL arindu
cintai aDangAda sandaik-kUccalai vENDEn cidAnanda jyOtiyai sadAnandam sheyyum
